Yop has found the the scalability and

by parallelizing or workload like that

container is
kind of lightweight virtualization

and management system the particularly
big use food we're making of containers

ec2 and there were able to use the

allows us to distribute workload across
all of our infrastructure there one of
the things we found running containers
on ec2 is you get a kind of best of both

provides the elastic scaling the ability
to provide hardware and capacity on
